trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖的宣告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements, which are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 SAML 判斷提示中的宣告是以 SAML 陳述式表示，而這些陳述式則由 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement> 類別表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines the following statement types:
trans-unit.target: SAML 規格會定義下列陳述式型別：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet" /> that represents the issuer of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖的簽發者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> to authenticate the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 安全性權杖的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an authorization policy for a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖的授權原則。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy" /> that represents an authorization policy for the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖的授權原則。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.CreatePolicy%2A> method to get an authorization policy for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.CreatePolicy%2A> 方法，取得 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全性權杖的授權原則。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別 (Derived Class) 中進行覆寫時會取得一個值，這個值會指出這個執行個體的屬性是否是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement> class, should set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `true` when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 從 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement> 類別衍生的類別應該在呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 方法時，將 `true` 屬性設定為 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使得這個執行個體成為唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性會設定為 `true`，而且將無法再設定這個執行個體的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> to read the SAML statement.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取 SAML 陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />，它能夠從 SAML 陳述式讀取 SAML 規格中所定義的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />，它會判定建立數位簽章的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads the SAML statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從指定的 XML 讀取器讀取 SAML 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method to read in a SAML statement, validate the XML, and set the appropriate properties that correspond to the attributes and elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> 方法，讀取 SAML 陳述式中的內容、驗證 XML，然後設定對應至屬性 (Attribute) 和項目的適當屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> to write the SAML statement.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入 SAML 陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />，它能夠將 XML 項目寫入至 SAML 判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Writes the SAML statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 將 SAML 陳述式寫入至指定的 XML 序列化程式。
